stratagem.goal: 80% of users will have to wait no more than 10s for any commit or retrieve operation bu the end of Q2

last4weeks.item: Released async commit feature and static data performance improvements

checks.item: Downloads are showing good increases, from 300 in May to 360 in June and 470 in July.

issue.name: On some days there are no developers working on SoC (when Jeff is HoSE)
issue.action: New graduate developer to start with the team in September

risk.name: Reduced team size - developer work will become significant bottleneck
risk.action: New graduate developer to be recruited for the team in September

improvement.name: Allocated area of the project whiteboard for team to add issues arising from the recent team changes
Compare Team providing stable engine build for SoC to use while they work on SQL2012
Team only taking stories of 5 Story Points of fewer into a sprint
In order to get all tests green, the team are performing Root Cause Analysis on one intermittenly failing test per day
The team is beginning to use ReviewBoard for async code reviews so they are better able to maintain flow

summary.item: Team has been focussing on our teamwork goal, working on the known/unknown feature.
SoC v3.0.13 has been released, containing several performance improvements and a survey that's shown on uninstall.
MT has taken over most of the Project Management responsibilities from CS.
Team's capacity remains reduced in August with MT not doing development and the new developer yet to start.
CVT is getting up to speed and doing some dev work as well as test.

snapshot.item: The team are still feeling the effects of changes in the SQL Tools division.
Goals have not yet been re-aligned to the reduced team size.
Team's ability to support sales and customers is also suffering.
The next grad dev starting at Red Gate will be joining the team, but he will be the only one in the medium-term.
